description.ar: قصر فاخر في أفضل مكان بطوكيو. يعيشُ سبعة أشقاء من عائلة شيونجي، وجميعهم جميلونَ للغاية. ونرى مغامرة أراتا العائلية بين صراع إيجاد الذات والوصول إلى أهدافهِ كونهُ الابن الأكبر للعائلة
description.en: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing won’t stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji "siblings" and knocks Arata’s world off its axis...
description.ja: 世田谷の豪邸に住む紫雲寺家の７人兄弟姉妹は、才色兼備で巷でもその名を轟かせている。長男の新は、個性の強い５人の姉妹に振り回されながらも家族を大切にして過ごしてきた。しかし、末の妹の誕生日会で父親から驚きの事実を告げられ、兄弟姉妹の運命は一変する―!?
description.pt-br: O amor entre irmão e irmã. O amor entre homem e mulher. Aquilo que é mais proibido é mais inabalável. Os dois filhos e as cinco filhas da família Shiunji brilham como pedras preciosas, cada um com inteligência e beleza incoparáveis. E com o pedigree de seu rico pai por trás deles, como poderiam não ser o assunto da cidade? O filho mais velho, Arata, passou a vida sendo infernizado pelos caprichos de suas deslumbrantes irmãs, mas nenhuma  provocação iria o impedir de valorizar sua família acima de tudo e de todos. Mas quando sua irmã mais nova completa quinze anos, seu pai revela um segredo há muito escondido dos "irmãos" Shiunji e vira o mundo de Arata de cabeça para baixo...

biography.en:
Reiji Miyajima (Japanese: 宮島 礼吏, Romaji: Miyajima Reiji) is a Japanese manga artist. He is known for his series AKB49: [Ren'ai Kinshi Jōrei](https://mangadex.org/title/4807a7aa-efeb-447e-9a94-068054fd7b7d/akb49-renai-kinshi-jourei) and [Rent-A-Girlfriend](https://mangadex.org/title/32fdfe9b-6e11-4a13-9e36-dcd8ea77b4e4/rent-a-girlfriend).

[Wikipedia Page](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reiji_Miyajima)

Reiji Miyajima (Japanese: 宮島 礼吏, Romaji: Miyajima Reiji) is a Japanese manga artist. He is known for his series AKB49: [Ren'ai Kinshi Jōrei](https://mangadex.org/title/4807a7aa-efeb-447e-9a94-068054fd7b7d/akb49-renai-kinshi-jourei) and [Rent-A-Girlfriend](https://mangadex.org/title/32fdfe9b-6e11-4a13-9e36-dcd8ea77b4e4/rent-a-girlfriend).

[Wikipedia Page](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reiji_Miyajima)
